text: is a train station located in the city of Kadoma, Osaka Prefecture, Japan. ==Lines== * Keihan Electric Railway ** Keihan Main Line ==Layout== The elevated station on the four-track section has only two side platforms for local trains. Express trains running on the middle two tracks cannot stop at this station. ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Kadoma, Osaka
title: Ōwada Station (Osaka)
